title: DIH status: Create a machine readable status element
description: Currently when the DataImportHandler process is executed the response does not have a machine readable DIH status. Although in the detail messages it does indicate the DIH status but it needs to be machine friendly. It would be nice if we have a new DIH status element which will contain the status of the DIH run.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: I believe this has been implemented long ago as Admin UI uses status API. So, it should be safe to close. Any objections?

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: Closing this issue as implemented. If the current implementation is insufficient or incorrect, a new issue can be created with more specific suggestions.
